name: Agente de viajes con IA Elevenlabs

parameters.text:
=Generate additional details that the traveller will need. 

Destination: "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.destination }}"

Departure location: "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.departure }}"

Passport type: CHANGE

Departure date: "{{ $('Flights codes & formatted dates').item.json.output.departure }}"

Return date: "{{ $('Flights codes & formatted dates').item.json.output.return }}"

messageValues.message:
=Turn the origin and destination into their airport codes.  Make sure the departure and return dates are in the future, not the past.  Here is the current date/time: {{ $now }}

Also make sure the email address is well formatted with an "@" and no spaces.

values.content:
=Generate a nice and short subject line related to this for the email we will send as travel plan. 

"{{ $json.output }}"

Do not include "" in the subject line.
